Uses of Interface
rim.Indexer

Packages that use Indexer
rim Provides a minimal framework for the needs of a multimedia information retrieval system. 
rim.cacm Provides implementations of the RIM framework for the CACM collection. 
 

Uses of Indexer in rim
 

Methods in rim with parameters of type Indexer
 int Feeder.parseCollection(java.net.URI collection, Indexer indexer)
          Parses the collection of documents denoted by the given URI and indexes its content (documents), using the given Indexer by calling its index(Integer, String) method.
 

Uses of Indexer in rim.cacm
 

Classes in rim.cacm that implement Indexer
 class CACMIndexer
          An indexer for the CACM collection.
